NF.Q: In the column Interview Stages of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 1752? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.

NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Interview Stages and column Onboarding Steps is the flow between 690 and 1752? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 894 and 963? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Part-time to node Average and from node Phone Screen to node Training Program, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Phone Screen} to node {Training Program} is larger.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Part-time to node Average and from node HR Interview to node Training Program, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Below Average to node Job Boards, from node Average to node Job Boards, and from node Average to node Social Media, which path has the largest flow?

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Recruitment Sources of the sankey chart is the most critical?

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Phone Screen to target node Referrals? Please list all node labels along this path.
